title: Bedbugs in my seattle apt looking for advice
text: So I have been getting tons of red bites recently and I am 99 percent sure it is bed bugs ( I have dealt with them before).I am not sure where they came from since I only go to work and back because of the quarantine so I am beginning to suspect it could be from one of my neighborsI am pretty sure that the apartment managers wont pay for this since I have lived here for 7 months and I am just now getting themDoes anyone know if I need to  alert the managers if I bring in an exterminator in to see if I have bedbugs and anything about the whole process? Also does anybody know anything about the local tenant laws regarding this.
